product_name: Sugoi 360 Mountain Bike Shorts - Men's - 2011 Closeout
long_description: Keeping you comfortable on and off the trail, the Sugoi 360 mountain bike shorts combine performance fabric and casual style so you can go straight from a day of riding to your favorite watering hole. Lightweight, durable nylon outer shorts provide comfortable coverage; removable stretch nylon liner shorts wick moisture away from skin and dry quickly. Liner shorts feature an integrated S.100 chamois that provides cushioning during long days of riding. The Sugoi 360 mountain bike shorts feature front and back pockets for easy storage.
